description:
The pilot of the http://anidb.net/ch128539 [Gundam Lfrith Thorn], dispatched by the anti-Spacian organization http://anidb.net/ch131851 [Dawn of Fold]. She is buddies with http://anidb.net/ch128541 [Sophie], who is in the same situation. Despite her tranquil demeanor, Norea has a strong resentment of Spacians and a pessimistic world view.
Source: Official page
name: Norea Du Noc
